long_description: Designed with a flattering silhouette so you feel your best during yoga practice, the Anue Interweave Tunic Top for women flaunts a draped neckline, flattering side ruching and an intricate racerback. Fabric blend has an incredibly soft texture and comfortable stretch, and features natural breathability. The Anue Interweave Tunic Top for women is semifitted.
short_description: Designed with a flattering silhouette so you feel your best during yoga practice, the Anue Interweave Tunic Top for women flaunts a draped neckline, flattering side ruching and an intricate racerback.
